Class SimpleBoard

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.SimpleBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Board
public class SimpleBoard extends Object implements Board
Implementation of the Board interface representing the game board. Manages the game matrix, brick movement, rotation, and hold functionality.
